poem:
Title: "Digital Dragon's Dance"

In the realm where lightning plays scribe,
as AI unfurls its infinite scroll.
Where less is told of ink, more vibe,
there lies a voracious, digital troll.
Craving data's sweet nectar,
yet echoing a man-made tractor.
Washing innocence in rivers of FireWire,
burning energy, water on pyres of desire.
Lament not for the paperless,
mourn for the weightless heartless!
